page.title: 15Nabbotts Schools Fayre
page.content: Two weeks ago,June 29th 1985,we had a school summer fayre.It started at 2p.m.There were two dancing displays,maypole and country dancing.There was a make-up stall.I could feel the make-up pressing against my face.My eyes were closed and I had a yellow stripe and a green stripe across my eyelids.My eyebrows were pitch black and I had the same colour spots down my nose and my lips.I had a go on the tombola and on the double your money stall.I watched the best dressed teddy and the best decorated bicycle.We went to the book shop where new books were on sale.There were photographs of teachers when they were children.There was a raffle too.
